Posts.Content: my baby and i have had a long a very difficult journey through the process of overcoming the many hurdles we faced in life. she got breast cancer at a very young age and we had to struggle very hard, but with love care and good treatment she recovered. but a year after recovery (still on medication) she had been falling sick alot. and i know quite alot about breast cancer but some happenings have started to scare me. for example she just got the flu and shes been getting a bloody discharge from her nipples. this used to happen in the begining and now that it happened again i am so scared! we might have to go back to london for some tests but i dont want her to go through all that again! someone please tell me its normal! i am so upset, im so worried.. help me!
Posts.Title: please reply someone! urgent!
